for t in range(int(raw_input())):
    low, high, result = [0] * (ord('z') - ord('a') + 1), [0] * (ord('Z') - ord('A') + 1), 0
    for c in raw_input():
        if c.islower():
            low[ord(c) - ord('a')] += 1
        elif c.isupper():
            high[ord(c) - ord('A')] += 1
    low += high
    for x in low:
        result += (x + 1) // 2
    print result
